description:
Liz and Patty Thompson take jobs as waitresses at Deathbucks, and manage to scare off much of the clientele, including Meme and Anya. However, Tsugumi sees something in them, and fights to keep going to the café, determined to become more like them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On se bat pour de vrai, là !
ここはリアルファイト!
